headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
It’s brutal out there. If the news of a potential Doomsday Scenario has you shook, make sure to stock up on ammunition and fortify your defenses. There's 40% off Facilties and Facility Upgrades and Modifications. 50% off MK II Weapon Conversions and Ammunition. As well as, a range of vehicles discounted this week, including:

- Mammoth Thruster – 35% off
- Volatol – 40% off
- Ocelot Pariah – 35% off
- HVY Chernobog – 35% off

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details!
